cats.name: Orange Tabby with Grass
cats.description: A fluffy orange tabby cat with distinctive white paws and a grumpy expression. Notable for having small pieces of green grass stuck to its face, suggesting recent outdoor activity.

characteristics.coat: Short-haired orange tabby with white paws
characteristics.temperament: Appears slightly grumpy but comfortable being held
characteristics.distinguishing_features: White paws (socks), light green collar, grass on face

grooming.special_notes: Check for debris after outdoor activities, clean face gently if needed

nutrition.diet: High-quality cat food appropriate for age and activity level
nutrition.water: Fresh water available at all times

health.exercise: Daily play sessions, access to safe outdoor areas

cats.image_description: Orange tabby cat held by person on balcony with grass on face

cats.name: Orange Tabby with Blep
cats.description: A cute orange tabby cat with a classic 'blep' expression - tongue slightly sticking out. Has soft, dense orange fur with subtle tabby stripes and large, round dark eyes.

characteristics.coat: Soft, dense orange fur with subtle tabby stripes
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Blep expression, large round eyes, prominent whiskers

grooming.special_notes: Gentle face cleaning, check for dental issues

nutrition.diet: Balanced cat food with proper protein content

health.dental_care: Important due to blep behavior, regular check-ups
health.exercise: Interactive play with toys, climbing opportunities

cats.image_description: Orange tabby cat with blep expression and large round eyes

cats.name: Tabby in Blue Dress
cats.description: A tabby cat wearing a blue, light blue, and yellow plaid dress or harness with ruffled details. Has a mix of brown, grey, and tan fur with a focused, slightly amused expression.

characteristics.coat: Brown, grey, and tan tabby pattern
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Wearing dress/harness, light chin and chest fur

grooming.special_notes: Check clothing for comfort, remove if causing stress

clothing_care.safety: Ensure no loose threads or hazards

cats.image_description: Brown tabby cat wearing blue plaid dress in kitchen setting

cats.name: Fluffy Persian in Pan
cats.description: A very fluffy, long-haired cat sitting inside a black frying pan on a stove. Has predominantly white fur with patches of light brown, ginger, and cream. Large, striking green eyes.

characteristics.coat: Very fluffy, long-haired, white with brown/ginger patches
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Extremely fluffy coat, green eyes, white whiskers

grooming.tools: Wide-toothed comb, slicker brush, detangling spray
grooming.special_notes: Prevent matting, regular professional grooming recommended

special_care.eye_care: Daily face cleaning due to flat face
special_care.temperature: Avoid hot environments, provide cool areas

cats.image_description: Fluffy long-haired cat sitting in black frying pan on stove

cats.name: Calico Floor Cat
cats.description: A fluffy, long-haired calico cat with white, black, and orange/brown patches. Sitting on a wooden floor with a stern expression. Has a round, voluminous body due to thick fur.

characteristics.size: Large (appears round due to thick fur)
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Very fluffy coat, round body, white whiskers

grooming.tools: Wide-toothed comb, slicker brush, detangling spray

special_care.weight_management: Monitor weight due to thick coat

cats.image_description: Fluffy calico cat sitting on wooden floor with water bowl nearby

cats.name: Expressive Tabby
cats.description: A highly expressive tabby cat with cream/tan and grey/brown markings. Captured with mouth wide open, showing pink tongue and teeth. Has large, round eyes with golden-yellow iris.

characteristics.coat: Short to medium-length tabby with cream/tan and grey/brown
characteristics.eye_color: Golden-yellow or amber with black pupils
characteristics.distinguishing_features: Very expressive face, prominent whiskers, vocal

grooming.special_notes: Gentle handling due to expressive nature

cats.image_description: Expressive tabby cat with mouth open, showing tongue and teeth

environment.litter_box: One per cat plus one extra

signs_of_illness: Changes in appetite or water consumption
